Name: Amber Dealer
SellAmbers:
Ramella the jeweler is procuring ore in
Goron City.

She says that if you give her a batch of
<clr:0000>10 pieces of amber<clr:ffff>, she'll buy them
for a high price.
Complete:
<clr:0000>Ramella<clr:ffff> purchased your <clr:0000>amber<clr:ffff>. If you bring her
ore in the future, she will buy it from you at a
slightly higher rate than elsewhere.
